Module Project_Milestone_3
Package inventory

Class InventoryManager

java.lang.Object
inventory.InventoryManager
public class InventoryManager extends Object
Represents the manager responsible for handling the inventory of products.

      Returns:

      public boolean cancelPurchase(String name, int quantity)
      Cancels the purchase of a specified quantity of a product.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the product.
      quantity - The quantity of the product whose purchase is to be canceled.
      Returns:
      true if the cancellation was successful; otherwise false.
